entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023
